sentences.cn: 由500个紧密相扣的块组成的拼图

sentences.en: All the units interlock with one another rigidly.
sentences.cn: 所有的元件严密地连锁在一起.

sentences.en: An over - temperature alarm and interlock is provided on the gases leaving the concentrating tower.
sentences.cn: 在离开浓缩塔的气体中安置有超温报警器和联锁装置.

sentences.en: Check machine and electric interlock validity in no force condition.
sentences.cn: 在不用力的情况下,检查机械和电气联锁的有效性.

sentences.en: Design of Safety Interlock Brake Device for Quick Closure of Pressure Vessels.
sentences.cn: 快开门式压力容器安全联锁制动装置的设计.

sentences.en: Interlock your fingers behind your back.
sentences.cn: 把手十指交错放到背后。

sentences.en: Lubricate of main bearing is ensured by oil supply interlock system.
sentences.cn: 供油联锁系统对确保主轴的润滑起到了保障作用.

sentences.en: On this state, it is be able to move reversely yet ( electric interlock ).
sentences.cn: 在这种分闸状态下, 反向移动也行 ( 机械联锁 ).

sentences.en: The examples of its applications in annunciation and interlock circuits are listed.
sentences.cn: 作了简要介绍,并列举了在信号报警和联锁保护电路中的应用实例.

sentences.en: The interlock protection and alarming are developed in the control system.
sentences.cn: 程序具有连锁保护和报警等功能.

sentences.en: The pieces of the puzzle lock into each other / lock together, ie interlock.
sentences.cn: 拼图各块拼合时都卡在一起.

sentences.en: There is an electrical and mechanical interlock safety bar.
sentences.cn: 设有机电联索的安全防护栅.

sentences.en: To engage and interlock securely so as to be immobile.
sentences.cn: 使固定紧紧地连结或咬合使其无法移动.

sentences.en: Your girlfriend's fear seems to interlock with your fear.
sentences.cn: 你女朋友的恐惧似乎与你的恐惧有密切关联。

phrases.tran_cn: 保险联锁装置；安全联锁装置

trans.tran_en: if two or more things interlock, or if they are interlocked, they fit firmly together
